chunks.chunk_text: Hello Hello 同情家族我們 Business English Essentials 課程已經過去了一個月我們大力恭喜 Wharton 跟文斌在七月份光速玩課八月份也是有一群學員們正在追趕進度中為了鼓勵大家持續掌握課程裡不同的商務情境John 老師在官網上發表了我們的玩課榜單每個月都會持續更新只要你玩課就會上該月的榜單喔大家加油啦Now let's get back to the regular program

chunks.chunk_text: Retail and food and beverage sales show growth while wholesale sector strugglesAccording to a recent report by the Ministry of Economic Affairs the domestic retail and food and beverage sectors experienced significant growth in sales last monthRetail sales reached $371.9 billion

chunks.chunk_text: that is $11.86 billionUSD marking a 13.9% year-on-year increase while food and beverage sales surged to $83.4 billion showing an impressive 34.7% rise compared to the previous yearOn the other hand the wholesale sector faced challengesexperiencing an eighth consecutive month of declinedue to weak demand and inventory adjustments

chunks.chunk_text: The growth in retail sales last month was primarily driven by department stores which reported a remarkable 30.4% increase compared to the previous yearAdditionally sales of automobiles, motorbikes and related components soared by 45% while clothing and accessories sales rose by 22.2%However, sales of information and communications technology products

chunks.chunk_text: was boosted by airlines adding more passenger flights leading to higher demand for in-flight mealsRestaurant sales also surged by 36.1% supported by the holiday effect of the Dragon Boat Festival and teacher appreciation banquets during the graduation seasonAdditionally beverage sales increased by 16%driven by higher demand for cold drinks amidst hot weather

chunks.chunk_text: The second quarter of the year retail sales continued to perform well rising by 12.7%year-on-yearreaching $1.12 trillionThe first six months of the year witnessed a record high in retail sales totaling $2.23 trillion showing a 9% growthThe food and beverage sector also experienced remarkable growth with sales in the second quarter rising

chunks.chunk_text: by 36.9% to $248.6 billion and sales in the first six monthsreaching a record high of $503.8 billion and a growth of 26.3%However, the wholesale sector faced ongoing challengesreporting an 11.4% decline in sales last monthamounting to 965.5%

chunks.chunk_text: The second quarter saw a 13.1% drop in wholesale sales totaling $2.82 trillionand sales for the first six months declined by 12.3%amounting to $5.61 trillionThe Ministry of Economic Affairs predicts that this month's retail and food and beverage sales will continue to rise as more people are willing
